name: Magical Musketeer Wild
text: You can activate "Magibullet" Spells/Traps from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap is activated in the same column as this card: You can target 3 "Magibullet" cards in your GY; shuffle all 3 into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter Wild" once per turn.
